thread.section_title: Tulips.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Tulips.com | www.tulips.com
thread.title: Kaitlin

author: Kaitlin
title: Kaitlin
text: I ordered daffodils for a member of my family who is sick. They are his favorite. Unfortunately, daffodils aren't in season but after searching the internet I found this amazing company! (The only company), and within 2 days 40 beautiful daffodils where delivered from Washington to Rhode Island. It was like they were picked yesterday! I will definitely be a repeat customer.
